content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Good afternoon, Mary. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to rent the apartment for 1000 Euros per month. This is my initial offer.
I am also open to negotiating with you. What is your counter offer?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your offer, Mary. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. I am willing to consider your offer, but I am looking for a higher rental price. I would be willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually agreeable price. What are your thoughts on this?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I am open to negotiating with you. Can we agree on a rental price of 1100 Euros per month?
I would like to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am willing to pay a little more.
Thank you for your time and consideration.
I agree to the price of 1100 Euros per month.
TERMINATE.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mary. I am pleased to hear that we have reached an agreement on the rental price. I appreciate your desire to be on good terms with me as your landlord, and I am looking forward to our successful business arrangement.
name: Heinrich Heine
